commits.author: Adam Strzelecki
commits.summary: Plain output theme: No need for separate print.css
commits.body:
Default print.css is just good enough, so we can get rid of the special one,
which makes top header to be printed.

commits.author: Adam Strzelecki
commits.summary: Plain web output theme matching system L&F
commits.body:
This theme is less intrusive than other bright themes and integrates well with
OS X Yosemite L&F. It uses system fonts for all output.

It is based on great Scott's theme:

  https://github.com/textmate/scott.tmbundle

NOTE: Theme switched stays invisible until it is hovered.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Remove font setting for unprintable characters

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Match tags in places other than solely HTML files.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: No longer specially target entities within source.* documents as it was causing issues with tags when used in source files.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: This was intended as a proof of concept of the available font styling but shouldn't be the default.

commits.author: Maximilian Ga√ü
commits.summary: Insert Menlo as monospace font after Vera
commits.body: Looks similar (a fork of it), and is the default monospace font on newer OS X

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Properly color embedded snippets of code
